arm_group.description: Capsule of Cilostazol 200 mg are taken orally on each study day
A capsule of placebo containing starch are taken orally on each study day.

brief_summary.textblock:
We will use Cilostazol as a tool to investigate its headache inducing effects in migraine
      patients.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Headache Inducing Effects of Cilostazol on Migraine Patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Diagnosed with migraine without aura according to the IHS criteria from 2004.

          -  Healthy besides migraine

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Tension-type headache more than 3 days per month

          -  Other types of primary headaches

          -  Pregnancy

          -  History of vascular diseases or psychiatric diseases.

facility.name: Danish Headache Center & Department of Neurology

clinical_study.official_title: The Headache Inducing Effects of Cilostazol on Migraine Patients

oversight_info.authority: Denmark: Danish Health and Medicines Authority

primary_outcome.description: Rectruitment of 14 patients will be done during April and May. Experiments will be carried out in May and June. Each experiment day takes 1½ hour. Data analysis will be done in June and July. Final data will be presented within 6 months.
primary_outcome.measure: The incidens of headache or migraine after adminstration of Cilostazol in migraine patients compared to placebo.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Outcome measure will be done within 3 month. Final data will be presented within 6 months

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Health Services Research
